info.title: Fireplace-NX
info.author: marice, ELY3M
info.description: A lovely pixelated retro fireplace simulator
info.details:
This project should be helpful to anyone trying to learn SDL2 on Nintendo Switch in c++.

PRESS PLUS TO RETURN TO HBMENU.
- Ported to Nintendo Switch from: https://www.hanshq.net/fire.html

Source:
https://github.com/Marice/Fireplace-NX

changelog:

test

The app code is fixed and updated to work with latest libnx and Atmosphere.

v2
- Updated and fixed to run on newer firmwares by ELY3M.
